text: "Hymn for the Weekend" is a 2016 song by British alternative rock band Coldplay featuring uncredited vocals from American singer Beyoncé and is taken from their seventh studio album A Head Full of Dreams (2015). The song peaked at number six in the United Kingdom and number 25 on the US Billboard Hot 100. It went to top 10 single charts in many countries around the world. The music video was shot in India. == References == Category:2016 songs Category:Coldplay songs Category:Beyoncé songs
title: Hymn for the Weekend
